title: Chair
description: very low wooden platform chair with wide rectangular seat; leans back, somewhat reclined backrest with twelve slats; high armrests that widen slightly from back to front; very short, spindly leg on wooden runners that widen towards back; comes with three off-white upholstered cushions with slight mosaic pattern
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by William Perreault
